translation.en: Don't you get it? The mind.
translation.ja: 問題は頭　心よ

translation.en: This is what I was missing when I was younger. I've got it now.
translation.ja: 若い頃は欠けてた 今ならある

translation.en: The mind does not swim 100 miles across the ocean, right? The body does.
translation.ja: 心は160キロ泳がない 泳ぐのは体よ

translation.en: Yes. That's the other piece of it.
translation.ja: それがもう一つの鍵

translation.en: - Oh, there's another piece. - Yes. I need to get myself functioning at the highest level. You'll be my coach.
translation.ja: 高度に動ける体にする コーチをやって

translation.en: That's why you wanted to play ping- pong. You never wanna play.
translation.ja: だから卓球したのね

translation.en: - No, no, so… Bonnie… - No, absolutely not. No, no, no.
translation.ja: ダメ　絶対にお断り

translation.en: Yeah, you said I needed to do something to get out of my funk.
translation.ja: 何か始めろと言った

translation.en: I meant you should sign up for speed dating or get a therapist,

translation.en: not come out of a 30- year retirement for some dangerous, absurd fantasy.
translation.ja: ブランク30年で 危険な夢に挑む気？

translation.en: I am doing it. I'm not done. I have more in me and so do you.
translation.ja: 私は終わってない もっとできる

translation.en: Come on. Don't you wanna be fully engaged, fully awake,
translation.ja: 何かに没頭したくない？

translation.en: your soul ignited by a purpose, a mission?
translation.ja: 目標や使命に魂を燃やすの

translation.en: It would be an amazing ride.
translation.ja: 最高の旅になる

translation.en: Think about it, you and me, a great adventure.
translation.ja: 想像して　２人で大冒険よ

translation.en: You were born to coach. And a coach needs an athlete.
translation.ja: コーチ 好きでしょ 選手が要る

translation.en: No, no, no! Serve.
translation.ja: 断る　サーブを

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'm doing a test swim down in Mexico.
translation.ja: 分かった　メキシコで 試験遊泳する

translation.en: Come. Let me show you what I got. Eight hours of serious currents in the open ocean.
translation.ja: 来て　見せてあげる 強い海流の外洋で８時間

translation.en: Diana, enough. Zip it and serve.
translation.ja: もう黙って　サーブを

translation.en: You'd get a great tan.
translation.ja: 小麦色に焼ける

translation.en: I can't believe you gotta put this on every single time.
translation.ja: 毎回これを塗るの？

translation.en: You know, I feel like I forgot something.
translation.ja: 犬のオヤツ 出しっ放し…

translation.en: I… I put the Milk- Bones out for the dog, but Gus is gonna--

translation.en: Bonnie, Bonnie, need your undivided attention, okay?
translation.ja: 絶対まずいよね ガスが食べちゃう しっかり集中してよ

translation.en: I wanna be 30 feet from the boat with you drafting to my left so I can see you when I breathe.
translation.ja: 息継ぎで見えるよう ９メートル左を並走して

translation.en: - Copy that. - Okay?
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: - How you feeling? Feeling okay? - No, I… I… I feel… I feel terrific.
translation.ja: 気分は？ 気分は最高 ５分前にも言ったでしょ

translation.en: Like I said five minutes ago.
translation.ja: 気分は最高 ５分前にも言ったでしょ

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: 結構

translation.en: - One, two, three, four. -
Diana, big long strokes!
translation.ja: ストロークは大きく長く

translation.en: Reach, reach, reach!
translation.ja: 手を伸ばして

translation.en: All the intellectualizations that we learn to get by with during life
translation.ja: 普段の合理的な思考で 気は紛れない

translation.en: don't count anymore, and it's a very dreamlike state.
translation.ja: 泳いでる時は 夢見心地なの

translation.en: - What do you think about? - Uh, I have a system of counting.
translation.ja: では何を？ 数ヵ国語で数を数えたり 歌うの

translation.en: A sort of hypnotic technique of singing songs…
translation.ja: 数ヵ国語で数を数えたり 歌うの

translation.en: You are worthless! I've already forgotten about you!
translation.ja: 一種の催眠効果ね お前らなんか知らん

translation.en: All of you!
translation.ja: お前らなんか知らん

translation.en: You women! I'm done!
translation.ja: お前らなんか知らん ウンザリだ！

translation.en: I'm feeling that I'm as powerful as that ocean.
translation.ja: 自分に力がみなぎり

translation.en: I'm 30 feet wide, with incredible strength and shoulders.
translation.ja: 肩幅も広く 厚くなった気分よ

translation.en: Nothing's gonna stop me to get to the other side.
translation.ja: 必ず対岸に着くから

translation.en: Diana Nyad's been packaged as the invincible marathon swimmer.
translation.ja: 最強スイマー ダイアナ･ナイアド

translation.en: After a year of training, she is in Havana ready to swim the 103 miles from Cuba to the Florida Keys.
translation.ja: ハバナからフロリダキーズ 165キロの旅に挑みます

translation.en: Nyad and her sponsors have spent about $150,000.
translation.ja: その費用は 15万ドルにも及び…

translation.en: 40 by 22- foot long, 10- ton steel cage.
translation.ja: 全長6.7メートル 重量10トンの鉄製ケージ

translation.en: This is designed to protect Diana Nyad from the sharks and Portuguese men of war
translation.ja: サメと毒くらげ(カツオノエボシ)から 彼女を守るものです

translation.en: which will be making the swim alongside her.
translation.ja: この中で泳ぎます

translation.en: Diana Nyad will swim approximately a quarter of a million strokes.
translation.ja: ナイアドは約25万回 水をかく計算になり

translation.en: She'll lose about 20 pounds doing it, and everyone expects her to be hospitalized from exhaustion and exposure.
translation.ja: 体重は９キロ落ち 疲労と日焼けで入院必至です

translation.en: If there was ever anyone who could do it, it's now and it's me.
translation.ja: できる人がいるなら それは私

translation.en: This swim is much, much closer to impossible than it is to possible.

translation.en: It's too cold. I can't.
translation.ja: 寒すぎる　無理

translation.en: I just don't think I can generate enough heat.
translation.ja: 十分な熱を生み出せない

translation.en: I don't know. What were you thinking? You pathetic, stupid--
translation.ja: どう思った？ 本当に情けない　ダメ

translation.en: - Hey, hey! No. No, no, no, no! - Stupid, stupid!
translation.ja: どう思った？ 本当に情けない　ダメ ダメ人間よ

translation.en: None of that, none of that. Don't beat yourself up. You're doing great.
translation.ja: 自分を責めないで よくやったよ

translation.en: Too cold. I can't.
translation.ja: 寒すぎる　もう無理

translation.en: - - Hold on, hold on. Let me get you a towel.
translation.ja: しっかり　頑張って

translation.en: I'm supposed to last 60 hours out there. I can only do six.
translation.ja: 60時間は泳ぐはずなのよ それがたった６時間

translation.en: What? How long did I make it?
translation.ja: 何？　実際は？

translation.en: Four hours and fourteen minutes.
translation.ja: ４時間14分

translation.en: Let me ask you, could there be another dream?
translation.ja: 他に夢はないの？

translation.en: Why… why would you say that to me?
translation.ja: どういうこと？

translation.en: I talked to Steve Munatones, you know, the open water swimming guy--
translation.ja: ムネトネスと話した 第一人者よ

translation.en: - Yes. I know who he is, Bonnie! - Okay. All right.
translation.ja: ムネトネスと話した 第一人者よ 知ってる

translation.en: Well, he doesn't think you can do it,
translation.ja: 彼は無理だって

translation.en: and he put me in touch with a doctor,
translation.ja: 医者も紹介してくれた

translation.en: uh, you know, big sports medicine guy, and he doesn't think you can do it either.
translation.ja: スポーツ医学の権威 彼も無理と

translation.en: What exactly did they say?
translation.ja: 何て言ってた？

translation.en: Well, they've been studying athletes, you know, for a long time,
translation.ja: 長年 選手を 研究してるけど⸺

translation.en: and, um, they don't believe that Cuba to Florida is humanly possible.
translation.ja: キューバとフロリダ間は 人間には無理だと

translation.en: I mean, especially not for a woman, especially not for someone your age.
translation.ja: 特に女性や その年ではねって

translation.en: Yeah, well fuck that.
translation.ja: クソ食らえよ

translation.en: Let me try again tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日またやる

translation.en: - You need recovery time. - No. Just one more time, okay?
translation.ja: 休んで もう一度よ　見てなさい

translation.en: Let me show you.
translation.ja: もう一度よ　見てなさい

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Good job, Diana!
translation.ja: その調子

translation.en: Good job!
translation.ja: いいよ

translation.en: Come on, you can do this!  Push it, Nyad!
translation.ja: いけるぞ　もう一頑張り

translation.en: Home stretch, home stretch!
translation.ja: ラストスパート

translation.en: - You can do this. Come on, Nyad, come on! -
translation.ja: お前ならできる　頑張れ

translation.en: Give me everything you've got! Everything you've got! Go! Let's go!
translation.ja: 全力を出すんだ　あと少し

translation.en: - Thirty- two- five- four. It's a record! - Yes!
translation.ja: 32秒54　新記録だ

translation.en: Eight hours and three minutes. Yes!
translation.ja: ８時間３分　やった！

translation.en: When you told me that thing, what that Steve and that so- called doctor said
translation.ja: ムネトネスと 医者の話を聞かされて⸺

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: 本当？

translation.en: - Oh my God! - No.
translation.ja: まさか！

translation.en: - You sneaky little-- - Now, that's why you're gonna be a terrific coach.
translation.ja: ウソなのね コーチに選んだだけある

translation.en: I don't know the first thing about training a swimmer.
translation.ja: 私 水泳は素人よ

translation.en: You don't need to. You'll learn.
translation.ja: いい　すぐ覚える

translation.en: I don't know. The whole… the whole Cuba thing,
translation.ja: どうかな キューバは大変でしょ

translation.en: with the visas and the logistics and the money. I mean, it… it… uh, there's sharks out there.
translation.ja: ビザとか物流とか資金とか サメもいるし

translation.en: - I'll handle all of it. -
translation.ja: 私が何とかする

translation.en: What about my clients?
translation.ja: 私の生徒は？

translation.en: - Oh, I don't know. - What about them?
translation.ja: 私の生徒は？ 別に死なないよ

translation.en: They'll survive!
translation.ja: 別に死なないよ

translation.en: Oh… You just gonna quit your sportscasting job?
translation.ja: スポーツ番組の方は？

translation.en: Yes! Come on! No more sitting on the sidelines. I've had it.
translation.ja: 辞める 傍観者でいるのは飽きた

translation.en: Listen, Bonnie, I just know I can do it, okay? And I wanna do it with you.
translation.ja: 私ならできる 一緒にやりたいの

translation.en: I gotta do it with you. I couldn't do it without you.
translation.ja: あんたがいなきゃ無理

translation.en: All right. Okay, I'm in.
translation.ja: いいよ やる

translation.en: All right! Yes!
translation.ja: そう来なくっちゃ！

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: You're at 52. Fifty- two.
translation.ja: 今１分52ストローク　52よ

translation.en: Good job.
translation.ja: いい感じ

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: いいよ

translation.en: Keep going.
translation.ja: 続けて

translation.en: I'm dealing with a swim in the open seawater. It'd be like fighting a heavyweight bout for two and a half days.
translation.ja: 外洋遊泳はヘビー級の試合を ２日半やるようなもの

translation.en: I feel like a panther myself. I feel like I'm very well trained.
translation.ja: 野獣になる気分よ 自分を追い込み 肉体をピークに持っていく

translation.en: No days off, to get myself in incredible muscular and cardiovascular shape.
translation.ja: 自分を追い込み 肉体をピークに持っていく

translation.en: Expending so many calories. I eat anywhere from 3,000 to 4,000 calories every three hours.
translation.ja: ３時間おきに 約4000カロリー食べる

translation.en: The physical strength and obviously, the mental courage are…
translation.ja: 肉体の力と同時に精神力も…

translation.en: If the seas remain calm,
translation.ja: 海が穏やかでも⸺

translation.en: she'll still have to brave sharks and exhaustion during her two and a half days in the water.
translation.ja: ２日半 サメや疲労と 闘う必要があります

translation.en: Just outside Australia, they have the largest
translation.ja: 沖には⸺ 世界最大の人食いザメが 泳いでるの

translation.en: man- eating pelagic sharks in the world off Cuba,
translation.ja: 世界最大の人食いザメが 泳いでるの

translation.en: and I don't take them lightly at all. In Bhiwani, we saw a 14- foot shark.
translation.ja: 過去に4.2メートルのサメを 見たことある

translation.en: Hey, how long she gonna be?
translation.ja: どのくらい泳ぐの？

translation.en: Uh, 8 hours and 31 minutes.
translation.ja: 今 ８時間31分

translation.en: It's a new fan. I think it's time we get outta Dodge.
translation.ja: 新しいファンよ そろそろ遠征ね

translation.en: I hate to interrupt your conversation,
translation.ja: 会話の邪魔をして 悪いけど⸺

translation.en: but, um, I… I just need an answer from you.
translation.ja: 会話の邪魔をして 悪いけど⸺ 確認させて ケージの手配はしたの？

translation.en: Did you contact that guy about the steel cage?
translation.ja: 確認させて ケージの手配はしたの？

translation.en: Oh. Oh yeah. No, I'm not doing that again.
translation.ja: あれね　いいえ 今回は使わない

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 本気？

translation.en: Well, a shark cage makes it an aided swim. No, thanks.
translation.ja: ケージを使うと 泳者は推進力を得る

translation.en: It's just me and the ocean the whole way.
translation.ja: 今回は私と海だけ

translation.en: Well, when were you gonna tell me that?
translation.ja: 言ってよ

translation.en: Yeah, I don't want an asterisk next to my life's greatest achievement.
translation.ja: 偉大な試みを 参考記録にしたくない

translation.en: - But you know it's never been done before. - Exactly.
translation.ja: 前例がないよ そう　だから史上初よ

translation.en: I'll be the first.
translation.ja: そう　だから史上初よ

translation.en: I'm the swimmer, Bon. It's my call.
translation.ja: 泳ぐ私が決める

translation.en: - Hello? - Come in, come inside.
translation.ja: どうぞ　入って

translation.en: - - Hello.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: - Oh my gosh. - Anna!
translation.ja: アナ！

translation.en: - I'm so excited to have you. - Thank you.
translation.ja: お待ちしてたわ

translation.en: - Bonnie, yes? - Bonnie.
translation.ja: ボニーね？

translation.en: - Here, I take. - Oh, that's okay, I got it, I got it.
translation.ja: いい　自分で持つ

translation.en: You know, I haven't seen Nina in years, but, uh, she and my mom still talk every week, and we always hear about you.
translation.ja: ニーナと母が仲よくて あなたのことは聞いてたわ

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - We're so grateful.
translation.ja: ニーナと母が仲よくて あなたのことは聞いてたわ どうも

translation.en: - Thank you so much. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 感謝してます

translation.en: - Our home is yours. - Our pleasure.  Isn't it, Mia?
translation.ja: 自分の家と思ってね でしょ？

translation.en: The English Channel, for example, is 21 miles.
translation.ja: イギリス海峡は全長33キロ

translation.en: I could swim that in seven and a half hours, even in the cold.
translation.ja: 私は寒い時期でも ７時間半で渡れる

translation.en: Cuba is on another level. It's 100 miles, or 60 hours,
translation.ja: キューバはレベルが違うの 160キロ　60時間かかる

translation.en: of constant swimming.
translation.ja: 泳ぎっ放しよ

translation.en: Now, I can stop to get medical attention,
translation.ja: 治療のため止まったり

translation.en: I receive nourishment from my handlers,
translation.ja: 途中で食べ物はもらう

translation.en: or just float and marvel at the dazzling universe above.
translation.ja: 海面に浮いて 満天の星を 見上げることもある

translation.en: It's just so cool.
translation.ja: 本当に素敵よ

translation.en: I'm this tiny speck
translation.ja: 私は こんなちっぽけな点

translation.en: floating under the stars,
translation.ja: 星の下を漂うの

translation.en: but I can't stop or touch the boat,
translation.ja: でも止まれないし 船に触れない

translation.en: even to poop or pee.
translation.ja: トイレの時もね

translation.en: - Do you poop in the water? -
translation.ja: 海でウンチを？

translation.en: - Yes. I'll get back to that. - Eww.
translation.ja: ええ　後で話すわ

translation.en: But first, I should tell you about the cold, the risk for hypothermia, but that's not what I'm most afraid of.
translation.ja: まずは寒さ　低体温症ね でも怖い物が他にも

translation.en: What are you most afraid of?
translation.ja: 一番怖い物は何？

translation.en: Sea creatures.
translation.ja: 生き物

translation.en: In these very waters, live some of the deadliest marine animals on Earth.
translation.ja: 最高に危険な海の生物が いっぱいよ

translation.en: Forty- nine varieties of sharks,
translation.ja: 49種類にも及ぶサメ

translation.en: stingrays, man of war.
translation.ja: カツオノエボシ

translation.en: And at night, you don't even know they're there.
translation.ja: 夜は近くでも分からない

translation.en: It's so dark you can barely see a few inches in front of your face,
translation.ja: 真っ暗で 目の前も見えないの

translation.en: and they're right out there just waiting for us.
translation.ja: でも彼らは潜んでいる

translation.en: Yes?
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: Here I am, 30 years later,
translation.ja: 30年ぶりの挑戦です

translation.en: and I would love to see Pizza Hut emblazoned on my swimsuit as I traverse these--
translation.ja: よければピザハットの ロゴを水着に付け…

translation.en: Yes. Your math is correct, I am 61, but that's the reason to do it, not the other--
translation.ja: ええ　確かに61歳ですが それが挑戦の理由で…

translation.en: Well, of course you're entitled to your opinion,
translation.ja: お考えは自由ですが⸺

translation.en: but I can't begin to tell you how incredibly wrong and shortsighted it is.
translation.ja: その近視眼的な思考に 驚きを隠せませんね

translation.en: First time, it was like taking candy from a baby.
translation.ja: 前回の資金集めは 超簡単だったよ

translation.en: I just… I strutted into Rocky Aoki's office, the Benihana guy,
translation.ja: 前回の資金集めは 超簡単だったよ ベニハナの ロッキー青木が⸺

translation.en: and I heard he was into ocean stuff, so I just showed up,
translation.ja: 海の冒険好きだから訪ねた

translation.en: and I walked out with this huge, like, lottery- sized check for $300,000.
translation.ja: すぐ宝くじ級の小切手 30万ドルを切ってくれた

translation.en: - You realize I've heard this story? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 前にも聞いた　400回はね

translation.en: - Right, like, 400 times. - It's a good story.
translation.ja: 前にも聞いた　400回はね いい話よ

translation.en: Yeah, but now it's like a giant- sized lottery check.
translation.ja: 今の私らにはメガ宝くじ級

translation.en: Think he wants to invest again?
translation.ja: また頼めば？

translation.en: Actually, he's dead.
translation.ja: 亡くなった

translation.en: Also, we need $500,000 this time.
translation.ja: それに今回は50万 要る

translation.en: Well, maybe we need, like, a new angle.
translation.ja: 考え方を変えてみたら？

translation.en: Less men in suits and more lady stuff.
translation.ja: もっと女性に目を向けるの

translation.en: - What do you mean, like tampons? -
translation.ja: タンポンとか？

translation.en: Not that we need those anymore, thank God.
translation.ja: 私たちは不要ね

translation.en: Also, Bon, not that I'm worried because I'm… I'm not, but
translation.ja: それと特に 心配してはいないけど⸺

translation.en: what are we gonna do about the sharks?
translation.ja: サメはどうしようか？

translation.en: - Sharks don't hunt people. Okay? - They don't wanna eat humans, they wanna eat seals.
translation.ja: サメは人を狙ってない 狙いはアザラシだ

translation.en: Yeah, but--
translation.ja: だけど…

translation.en: Sometimes, they'll test whether you are in fact a seal.
translation.ja: アザラシか確認しに 人に近づく

translation.en: How exactly do they test you? I mean…
translation.ja: どう確認するの？

translation.en: That's why we have the shield.
translation.ja: そこでシールドだ

translation.en: Two electrodes attached to the back of each kayak
translation.ja: ２本の電極を カヤックに装着して

translation.en: that transmit an amplified signal. They hate it. You watch.
translation.ja: サメの嫌う電気信号を流す 見てて

translation.en: Is… is that really necessary?
translation.ja: やり過ぎよ

translation.en: Don't worry, we've tested it. Tried it on a bloody horse's leg in the South Pacific.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　南太平洋で 馬の脚で試した

translation.en: Now, that's a dinner bell for a shark. They all turned away.
translation.ja: ごちそうだ すぐ寄ってきた

translation.en: Do you think you can, like, shine a light on her at night? 'Cause I can't see her,
translation.ja: 夜間に照明は使える？ 彼女が見えず⸺

translation.en: and the only way I know where she is is when she's, uh, slapping the water… - Guys! - …with her hands.
translation.ja: 水をかく音だけで 位置を確認してるの

translation.en: - Light attracts bait fish. - Hello?
translation.ja: 光は魚を集める

translation.en: - Guys! - Oh, he's coming in. Watch.
translation.ja: 来た　見てて

translation.en: Hey! Tiny sensory organs in the snout. The electrical current messes them up.
translation.ja: 鼻先の器官が 信号を感知した

translation.en: Me and my divers will be all eyes and ears doing our sweeps, ready if, God forbid, the shield goes down.
translation.ja: シールドが破られた時は 我々でサメを追い払う

translation.en: I'd… I'd like to know what weapons you use. Is it like spear guns, or… or--
translation.ja: その時に武器は何を使うの？ 水中銃とか…

translation.en: Poles with tennis balls.
translation.ja: テニスボール付き棒

translation.en: We won't harm 'em. You know, just a prod on the snout.
translation.ja: 傷つけず これで鼻面を叩く

translation.en: So, no weapons.
translation.ja: 武器は使わない

translation.en: Look, Diana, we'll protect you, all right?
translation.ja: ダイアナ　君のことは守る

translation.en: But you gotta remember, this is their ocean, okay? You're just passing through.
translation.ja: だが ここは彼らの海 君は通り過ぎるだけ

translation.en: Just think of the marketing opportunities with me at the forefront.
translation.ja: 私の市場機会を 考えてください

translation.en: I don't know, maybe, Still dry.
translation.ja: コピーは“まだ乾いてる”

translation.en: Or just go classic, me on a billboard with your iconic slogan ribboned beneath me,
translation.ja: または私の写真の下に 御社の有名なコピーを

translation.en: Strong enough for a man, but made for a woman.
translation.ja: “男性にも効くが女性用”

translation.en: Oh, of course.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, Deb.
translation.ja: どうも　デビー

translation.en: I think I just scored us a sponsor.
translation.ja: スポンサー獲得よ

translation.en: - Yeah! All right! - Whoo!
translation.ja: やったね

translation.en: So I got a lead on a navigator guy.
translation.ja: 航海士の当てが

translation.en: - You show me a navigator… - He's in from Key West.
translation.ja: 三流の人間なら不要よ

translation.en: - …that isn't full of shit. - You can't drive the boat too. We need this guy.
translation.ja: 航海士は要る　優秀だって

translation.en: Everybody says he's great, they call him the King of the Gulf.
translation.ja: メキシコ湾の王って評判よ

translation.en: So, I invited him for lunch tomorrow, and I'm gonna order you the fish tacos with the salsa on the side,
translation.ja: 明日のランチに呼んだ メニューは魚のタコス

translation.en: and you're gonna be your most charming self, aren't you?
translation.ja: 魅力を振りまいてよね

translation.en: Nice boat.
translation.ja: いい船ね

translation.en: I designed her myself.
translation.ja: 設計した

translation.en: I had to re- draw the lines plans, like, 76 times.
translation.ja: 船体線図は何度も書き直した 数え切れん

translation.en: My wife thought I was freaking out of my mind, but she's perfect.
translation.ja: 女房は心配してたが 完璧だよ

translation.en: - Your wife or your boat? - Both of 'em.
translation.ja: 奥さん？　船？ 両方さ

translation.en: John Bartlett.
translation.ja: ジョン･バートレット

translation.en: I used to watch you on the Wide World of Sports.
translation.ja: スポーツ番組を見てた

translation.en: Oh yeah? Thrill of victory, agony of defeat, and all that shit?
translation.ja: “勝利のスリル 敗北の苦痛”ってやつね

translation.en: I need to see your navigation cabin.
translation.ja: 船室を見せて

translation.en: No problemo.
translation.ja: いいとも

translation.en: The Gulf Stream's a raging dick. It's basically a fast- moving river in the middle of the ocean
translation.ja: メキシコ湾流は暴れ馬 海の中を流れる急流だ

translation.en: going east when you wanna go north.
translation.ja: 北に行きたくても東に流され 泳ぐ速度が遅いと…

translation.en: - If you're not exceeding its speed-- - You're going backwards.
translation.ja: 北に行きたくても東に流され 泳ぐ速度が遅いと… 押し戻される　知ってる 以前に挑戦してるの

translation.en: Yes, I know. You are aware that I've tried this before?
translation.ja: 押し戻される　知ってる 以前に挑戦してるの

translation.en: Well, I don't need a primer on the Gulf Stream, okay?
translation.ja: 入門用の解説は結構

translation.en: What I need to know is what qualifies you for this mission.
translation.ja: あなたが適任か知りたい 経歴は？

translation.en: - What's your pedigree? - Wait… wait a minute. What… what is this?
translation.ja: あなたが適任か知りたい 経歴は？ 待てよ 俺は売り込んじゃいない 妙にケンカ腰だな

translation.en: Do you think I'm selling you here, or do you just have a hair across your ass?
translation.ja: 俺は売り込んじゃいない 妙にケンカ腰だな

translation.en: My last navigator screwed me, okay?
translation.ja: 前の航海士が無能でね

translation.en: He had me slamming into the surf for 14 hours straight.
translation.ja: 14時間も波に向け 進ませた でなきゃ成功し…

translation.en: - I would've made it if he hadn't-- - Well, that's on you.
translation.ja: 14時間も波に向け 進ませた でなきゃ成功し… 自業自得だ 78年の航海士を調べた

translation.en: I looked him up, your old navigator from '78.
translation.ja: 自業自得だ 78年の航海士を調べた

translation.en: America's Cup preppy asshole who didn't know shit about the Straits.
translation.ja: “アメリカ杯 出場”に 目がくらんだろ

translation.en: You can have all the pedigree in the world,
translation.ja: 経歴が立派でも⸺

translation.en: but if you haven't sailed here, if you haven't put in your 10,000 hours, these counter- currents, these eddies,
translation.ja: この海の経験がなく 反流や渦を知らなきゃ無理だ

translation.en: it's like getting a freaking horse trainer to install your dishwasher.
translation.ja: 調教師に食器洗浄機は 設置できない

translation.en: - That's poetic. - Step outside with me for a minute.
translation.ja: ちょっと来い

translation.en: Stick out your tongue. Stick out your tongue.
translation.ja: 舌を出してみろ いいから出せ

translation.en: You taste that?
translation.ja: 分かるか？

translation.en: - I don't know, salt? - No.
translation.ja: 塩？ 違う　サハラ砂漠の砂だ

translation.en: Sand from the Sahara 7,000 miles away.
translation.ja: 違う　サハラ砂漠の砂だ それだけ ここの風は強い

translation.en: That's what this wind'll do.
translation.ja: それだけ ここの風は強い

translation.en: What you wanna do has never been done, right? The course must be exact.
translation.ja: 前例のない挑戦だろ？ コースは正確でないとな

translation.en: The axis of the stream has to be calculated by someone who knows what the hell they're dealing with
translation.ja: 潮の流れに詳しい人間が コースを計算し

translation.en: so the stream will work for you, not against you, recomputing every 15 minutes.
translation.ja: 15分おきに修正すれば 潮は敵でなく味方に

translation.en: You're off a fraction of a degree to the east,
translation.ja: ほんの数度ずれれば⸺

translation.en: you're headed to the Turks and Caicos, a fraction to the west, Texas,
translation.ja: バハマの南か テキサスに行っちまう

translation.en: or worse, you're spun into an eddy.
translation.ja: 最悪だと渦に はまる

translation.en: So choose the wrong dude again. No biggie. It just might cost you your life.
translation.ja: だから人選を間違えれば 命取りになるぞ

translation.en: Well, thank you for your interest in the position.
translation.ja: なるほど 興味ありということね

translation.en: - Bye. - He'll do.
translation.ja: またな 彼 やるよ

translation.en: Hey… hey, wait. Uh, what about lunch?
translation.ja: 待って　ランチどう？

translation.en: You got a beer?
translation.ja: ビールは？

translation.en: - Yeah. - I need a beer.
translation.ja: もらう

translation.en: If anybody in the world can do it, it's her. Come on.
translation.ja: できる人がいるなら彼女 でしょ？

translation.en: You must see it, like, a little bit. Otherwise, you wouldn't be sitting here, right?
translation.ja: あなたも見たいはず でなきゃ残ってない

translation.en: You brought me lunch.
translation.ja: ランチのため

translation.en: Correct, I did.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: I'll be honest with you, Bonnie. I don't know. I really don't.
translation.ja: 正直 本当に分からない

translation.en: There's only a few days each year when the wind direction and the stream will maybe let a swimmer cross.
translation.ja: 風と潮が横断に適する日は 年に数日だけ

translation.en: Maybe. It's a tiny window.
translation.ja: 非常に限られてる

translation.en: And even then, she may not make it. You know?
translation.ja: それで泳いでも 失敗するかも

translation.en: Plus, your deal is all volunteer, no comp.
translation.ja: おまけに 報酬もないわけだろ

translation.en: We train for months and may not even get a green light.
translation.ja: 何ヵ月も準備し 中止も

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: Wanna know my favorite feeling ever?
translation.ja: 最高の気分の話を

translation.en: When I was… when I was playing racquetball at my peak, and I was 30,
translation.ja: ラケットボール選手として 絶頂期の30歳の頃⸺

translation.en: and it was just me and the girls just goofing off all around the country like brats,
translation.ja: 仲間と国中を回り オフはドンチャン騒ぎ

translation.en: you know, and then… then it's… it's game day and you get that rush,
translation.ja: 試合日になると 体中に熱気がほとばしる

translation.en: like, I'm gonna win, I'm gonna win, you know?
translation.ja: 絶対に勝つぞってね

translation.en: I mean, the only way that I'm gonna get that magic at this age is through her.
translation.ja: 今 あの魔法を得られるのは 彼女を通してだけ

translation.en: How many more chances are we gonna get to do heart- pumping shit, huh?
translation.ja: あんな興奮を あと何度 感じられる？

translation.en: So that's why you're here.
translation.ja: だからか

translation.en: Yeah, that and she needs me.
translation.ja: それに必要とされてる

translation.en: Don't ask me why.
translation.ja: 理由は聞かないで

translation.en: And we really need you. I promise you, it won't be boring.
translation.ja: あなたが必要なの 退屈させない

translation.en: Some people say boring is underrated.
translation.ja: 退屈も悪くないとか

translation.en: Wild guess, you're not one of 'em.
translation.ja: あなたは違うはず

translation.en: - Yikes. Bad. -
translation.ja: これ ひどいね

translation.en: I'm gonna call around, see what people are using.
translation.ja: いい薬を探しとくから

translation.en: And, uh, you know, we got some good ideas about how to keep you following the boat.
translation.ja: それと船に沿い 泳げる方法を考えた

translation.en: How you feeling? Ready for the overnight?
translation.ja: 徹夜遊泳いける？

translation.en: - Yes, yes. - Well, you look great.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Look, hardening up. How's that shoulder? Still seizing up on you?
translation.ja: 体は仕上がってきてる 肩の痛みは？

translation.en: It's… it's not too bad.
translation.ja: 悪くない

translation.en: How about… how about your mind? Like on the long swims?
translation.ja: 心の方は？ 長距離遊泳の覚悟ある？

translation.en: It's good. I've got my playlist up to about 85 songs.
translation.ja: ええ　プレイリストは 今85曲よ

translation.en: Neil Young, Janis Joplin, The Beatles.
translation.ja: Ｎ･ヤング　Ｊ･ジョプリン

translation.en: If I sing No Reply 1,000 times in a row, that's 9 hours and 45 minutes to the beat.
translation.ja: 「ノー･リプライ」を 1000回 歌うと９時間45分

translation.en: I may need one more song, though, but it has to be in 4/4 time to go with the stroke.
translation.ja: あと１曲 泳ぎ(ストローク)と合う4/4拍子の

translation.en: Also, just so you know,
translation.ja: それと一応 言っとく

translation.en: if you find yourself going someplace dark,
translation.ja: ネガティブな幻覚を見たり

translation.en: you know, find yourself beating up on yourself just--
translation.ja: 自虐的感情が湧いたら…

translation.en: I said I'm fine. Let me do that, okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫だってば　やらせて

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: やろう

translation.en: Everybody, all right, listen up.
translation.ja: 61歳　24時間テスト遊泳 ２０１１年４月20日 61歳　24時間テスト遊泳 ２０１１年４月20日 全員ちょっと聞いて

translation.en: So, 24- hour training swim.
translation.ja: いよいよね

translation.en: Uh, this is our lovely Dee, she's our captain.
translation.ja: こちらがディーよ 我らが船長

translation.en: When she's at the helm, nobody talks to her. All right?
translation.ja: 操舵(そうだ)中は話しかけないこと

translation.en: I've never heard that woman speak, but she's the best in the biz.
translation.ja: 彼女は超無口だが 腕は確かだ

translation.en: Same goes for the swimmer. When in the water, no talking to her.
translation.ja: スイマーにも同様 泳ぎ出したら 話しかけないで

translation.en: No joking. Serious business.
translation.ja: 泳ぎ出したら 話しかけないで

translation.en: On our way, let's go. You guys know each other.
translation.ja: では 知り合いね

translation.en: Hey, Dee.
translation.ja: ディー

translation.en: Yeah, the red light was Nico's idea.
translation.ja: 夜用の赤色灯

translation.en: We can't train a spotlight on you. That'd send all kinds of creatures after you.
translation.ja: 照明を使うと 生物は寄るが⸺

translation.en: But they don't like red.
translation.ja: 赤い色は嫌う

translation.en: If we can't get something into her gut, her body will start eating itself.
translation.ja: 食べないと 体は自らを消費する

translation.en: So, feedings every 90 minutes, but you never tell her what time it is.
translation.ja: だから飲食は90分おき 時刻は教えないで

translation.en: And, uh, you know, try not to… to bump up against the ego.
translation.ja: それと なるべく 彼女と衝突しないように

translation.en: You know, don't yell at her. She does not respond well to tough love. But don't baby her either.
translation.ja: 怒鳴らないでね といって甘やかすのはダメ

translation.en: When she starts to hallucinate, you go with it. Okay?
translation.ja: 幻覚を見てたら 話を合わせて

translation.en: Okay, let's show her.
translation.ja: 例の物を

translation.en: Oh, hey, check it out.
translation.ja: ちょっと これ見て

translation.en: Bartlett made you a lane so you can stay closer to the boat.
translation.ja: 彼が作ったレーン 並泳しやすい

translation.en: - You did that? - I did.
translation.ja: あなたが？ ああ

translation.en: The mind deteriorates along with the body. When the body weakens and the hallucinations start,
translation.ja: 心が体を弱らせ 体が弱ると幻覚が出だす

translation.en: it's like sensory deprivation.
translation.ja: 感覚遮断

translation.en: I thought that gulls were dive- bombing my calf and I thought there was blood down the front of my face.
translation.ja: カモメが急降下したと思い 目の前が血だらけ…

translation.en: I can barely see.
translation.ja: 見えない

translation.en: The mental stress that you go through is unbelievable, just about torture.
translation.ja: 極度の精神的ストレスで 拷問のようです

translation.en: I was vomiting and I was losing all my strength and…
translation.ja: おう吐して 体の力が全部 抜け…

translation.en: Can you read what it says after Nyad?
translation.ja: “ナイアド”は 何と書いてる？

translation.en: That is your name, Diana. This is your destiny.
translation.ja: これがお前の名前 お前の運命だ

translation.en: So after your turn, I wanna see you increase that stroke rate.
translation.ja: ターン後 ストローク数を上げろ

translation.en: Wait, what is that?
translation.ja: それは？

translation.en: - What? Let me see. - I was just kidding.
translation.ja: 見せて

translation.en: Why are you throwing up?
translation.ja: なぜ吐くの？

translation.en: Because…
translation.ja: それは⸺

translation.en: …because I just swam for 24 hours.
translation.ja: 24時間ずっと 泳いでたからよ

translation.en: Hey, visas came through. We're cleared for Cuba.
translation.ja: キューバ行きビザがおりた

translation.en: - Better? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 平気？

translation.en: - All right. High- five. -
translation.ja: ハイ･ファイブよ

translation.en: Finally tonight, someone who was a kind of hero for so many of us,
translation.ja: ついに今夜 かつてのヒーローである⸺

translation.en: Diana Nyad, the incredible swimmer,
translation.ja: 超人スイマー ナイアドが⸺

translation.en: is back and about to embark on something we couldn't believe.
translation.ja: 前代未聞の挑戦で復帰です 前代未聞の挑戦で復帰です キューバ　ハバナ

translation.en: …set her sights on conquering a feat that has eluded her for 30 years.
translation.ja: キューバ　ハバナ 30年前に逃した偉業に 挑みます 30年前に逃した偉業に 挑みます

translation.en: I hope to encourage unity
translation.ja: 〈この遊泳が両国の 融和と良好な関係を〉

translation.en: and good relations between our two countries.
translation.ja: 〈この遊泳が両国の 融和と良好な関係を〉 〈促進することを 希望します〉

translation.en: A connection.
translation.ja: 〈つながりです〉

translation.en: And I can't wait to set off as soon as the weather allows.
translation.ja: 〈天気に恵まれ次第⸺〉 〈出発するのが 待ち遠しいです〉

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: 〈ありがとう〉

translation.en: Uh, you know what?
translation.ja: 聞いて

translation.en: I-- There's something I wanna say to all of you.
translation.ja: 全員に言いたいことが あるの

translation.en: As we await the signal from Mother Nature,
translation.ja: 今は自然の 合図待ちだけど⸺

translation.en: I signed a contract with my soul to never, ever give up.
translation.ja: 自分の魂と契約した 絶対に諦めないってね

translation.en: You've all sacrificed a great deal.
translation.ja: 皆の犠牲に感謝する

translation.en: No money, no perks, no guarantees.
translation.ja: 何の報酬も特典も 保証もないのよ

translation.en: But I can think of no worthier cause for such sacrifice.
translation.ja: 自分がふさわしいか 自問している

translation.en: My life's mission, dare I say my destiny,
translation.ja: 私の運命だと断言するわ

translation.en: to fight the wildly unpredictable conditions, to tangle with the elements.
translation.ja: 予測不能な大自然の力と 闘うのは運命なの

translation.en: I will be the first Nyad.
translation.ja: 最初の“ナイアド”になる

translation.en: If you look my name up in the dictionary, you will see…
translation.ja: この名を辞書で調べれば…

translation.en: - That's great. - …literally water nymph.
translation.ja: 名演説よ

translation.en: Thank you so much. And… and… to… to… to destiny.
translation.ja: ありがとう では乾杯しよう　運命に

translation.en: - To all of us. To Cuba. Okay? - To Cuba.
translation.ja: 私たちに　キューバに

translation.en: - To waiting for the weather. - Yes.
translation.ja: 天候待ちに

translation.en: If we don't get out in a couple of weeks, temp drops.
translation.ja: あと半月で水温が下がる

translation.en: - A year down the drain. - Yeah.
translation.ja: １年がムダに

translation.en: So, how's it looking?
translation.ja: 予報は？

translation.en: I… I got three different forecasters, both for weather and the axis of the stream.
translation.ja: 天気と潮の予報を ３つ見比べてる

translation.en: One in Maryland, one in Washington, one in the Miami Hurricane Center. - I'm… I'm comparing their models. - And?
translation.ja: メリーランドとワシントンと 国立ハリケーン･センター

translation.en: And it's Russian Roulette.
translation.ja: 厳しい賭けだな

translation.en: We might have a window when this clears. Might.
translation.ja: 晴れる時間はあるかも

translation.en: I'd put our chances at marginal to fair.
translation.ja: 可能性は ギリギリってとこだな

translation.en: I gotta get out of here.
translation.ja: 出てくる

translation.en: Go for a run or something.
translation.ja: 走らないと

translation.en: Have you looked outside?
translation.ja: 外 見た？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I have to stay ready.
translation.ja: 準備よ

translation.en: Uh, you are ready. I bumped into you in the kitchen, it was like walking into a brick wall.
translation.ja: もう万端　ぶつかった時 壁かと思った

translation.en: All right, look, I… I don't want you to burn out,
translation.ja: 体力を消耗したらダメよ

translation.en: so just sit still, be patient. I know it's hard. It's hard.
translation.ja: だから静かにしてて つらいのは分かる

translation.en: No, you actually don't know. You don't have to do it.
translation.ja: あんたは泳がないものね

translation.en: It's easy for you to say that, right?
translation.ja: 言うのは簡単

translation.en: Yeah? Cut the shit. All right? All this me- me- me- me crap.
translation.ja: その“私だけが”って態度 やめてよ

translation.en: - What? - I remortgaged my house for this--
translation.ja: 私の家は抵当に

translation.en: Yeah, so did I.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: Well, then the correct response would be thank you.
translation.ja: 普通は感謝するもんでしょ

translation.en: Oh, so you're just gonna leave? No, no, go ahead, fine.
translation.ja: 逃げるの？ どうぞ　行って

translation.en: Okay. No, go ahead. It's okay. Just go smoke a joint or something.
translation.ja: どうぞ マリフアナでも吸って

translation.en: Why don't you do some yoga? Read a book.
translation.ja: ヨガか読書でもしたら？

translation.en: I didn't bring a book!
translation.ja: 本なんかない

translation.en: Storm's over.
translation.ja: 嵐が去った

translation.en: It's our window. This is it, Diana. It's go time.
translation.ja: チャンスだ やったな　行くぞ

translation.en: There are 16 million people who do open water swimming.
translation.ja: この競技の人口は1600万人

translation.en: There are 116 people who have actually swum over 24 hours straight.
translation.ja: うち連続24時間以上 泳いだ者は116人

translation.en: But to go more than 48 hours,
translation.ja: だが48時間以上は⸺

translation.en: that's only 12 people in the history of the world.
translation.ja: わずか12人だけです わずか12人だけです “ナイアド 30年ぶりに⸺”

translation.en: And of those 12,
